code: import{createSelector}from"reselect";var selectGallery=function selectGallery(state){return state.gallery;};export var selectCollections=createSelector([selectGallery],function(gallery){return gallery.collections;});export var selectCollectionsForPreview=createSelector([selectCollections],function(collections){return Object.keys(collections).map(function(key){return collections[key];});});export var selectCollection=function selectCollection(collectionUrlParam){return createSelector([selectCollections],function(collections){return collections[collectionUrlParam];});};
